title: Diff. eq. with slope field part - b

content.question: Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation with the initial condition f(-1) = 1 and state its domain.

frqParts.text: Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation with the initial condition f(-1) = 1 and state its domain.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
